short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that incrementally improves on the University of Utah CIS experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Current Features:

- Rate My Professors Integration in Schedule Builder

Planned Features:

- Rate My Professors Integration in Class Checkout/Registration
- Google Calendar export for class registration
- CIS Search
